title: I need 3 dollars worth of RP
body:
Legit 2.8 dollars worth of rp.
anyone feeling generous?

replies.body: The thing is, i'm dirt poor and all I need is 3 dollars.
Just buy $5 of RP, you get what you need and then you have some left over for like a cheap on sale skin or something.  Or a hextech chest and key.

Here is what you do.  Create something extremely creative, then send it to riot, whether it be an online drawing, or anything you want it to be.  Send it in a support ticket to Riot and tell them you just need a few Riot Points, and if it is creative enough, they will give it to you.  My friend needed 4 RP to get a chroma pack, so he made a drawing of the Pool Party Leona chroma and a few other things and Riot gave him the RP.  Good luck and be creative
He needs about 364 RP which is a lot more than I think drawings with get him
